snippet: ISRAEL--Justin. The brokers and staff of Fox Residential Group send our most heartfelt condolences to our dear colleague, Emel Glicksman, on the passing of her beloved husband, Justin. Our thoughts and prayers are with Emel and her family during this difficult time. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Justin. The brokers and staff of Fox Residential Group send our most heartfelt condolences to our dear colleague, Emel Glicksman, on the passing of her beloved husband, Justin. Our thoughts and prayers are with Emel and her family during this difficult time. 1/3
